changeSet.author: jk00kg
changeSet.sql: update Organisation set commentsEmailedTo = publisherEmail where commentsEmailedTo IS NULL;

changeSet.author: jk00kg
changeSet.sql: update Organisation set commentsEmailedTo = creatorEmail where commentsEmailedTo IS NULL;

changeSet.author: jk00kg
changeSet.sql: update Organisation set commentsEmailedTo = 'enquires@about.e-monocot.org' where commentsEmailedTo IS NULL;

changeSet.author: jk00kg
changeSet.sql: update Organisation set commentsEmailedTo = publisherEmail where char_length(trim(commentsEmailedTo)) < 1;

changeSet.author: jk00kg
changeSet.sql: update Organisation set commentsEmailedTo = creatorEmail where char_length(trim(commentsEmailedTo)) < 1;

changeSet.author: jk00kg
changeSet.sql: update Organisation set commentsEmailedTo = 'enquires@about.e-monocot.org' where char_length(trim(commentsEmailedTo)) < 1;
